title: Commerce
creator_credit: John Leake, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Australia in the 80’s”.
A look at Australia’s image within the world of commerce in the 1980’s - its transportation, stock exchanges, futures markets, and its growth in the cattle, produce and minerals industries. Suitable for lower secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: John Leake, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
